backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of core frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode variants with global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling heart burst interaction and displaying the love message and footer.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Interactive heart component creating burst particles, ripple effects, and calling a completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining a romantic OKLCH palette, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color palettes, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and state information for a romantic heart-burst webpage project.
